  • Field Details

    • brickLives

      public int brickLives

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick(double x, double y, double width, double height, int brickLives, int brickRow)
      Constructs a Brick object with the specified position, dimensions, lives, and row. The color of the brick is determined based on the row it belongs to. The brick is initially filled, and the counter is incremented.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the brick's position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the brick's position.
      width - The width of the brick.
      height - The height of the brick.
      brickLives - The initial number of lives the brick has.
      brickRow - The row to determine the color of the brick.

  • Method Details

    • destroy

      public void destroy(Breakout program)
      Destroys the brick by making it invisible, playing a sound, updating the counter, and removing it from the program. If all bricks are destroyed, it updates the game state to the next level or "YouWin" if the final level is reached.
      Parameters:
      program - The Breakout program instance.

    • clearCounter

      public static void clearCounter()
      Clears the brick counter, resetting the total number of bricks.

    • bricksLeft

      public static int bricksLeft()
      Returns the number of bricks left in the game.
      Returns:
      The number of bricks left.

    • getBrickBost

      public double getBrickBost()
      Gets the boost value of the brick.
      Returns:
      The boost value of the brick.
